descriptionHtml:
[color=lime][b][center][size=8]Lorecraft[/size][/b][/color]
[color=cyan][size=4]- Vanilla Blacksmithing Tutorial Patch -[/size][/color][/center]

[size=4][color=yellow][b]Overview:[/b][/color][/size]
After installing Lorecraft you can only craft recipes after you read a book on how to do it. But there is a blacksmithing tutorial that pretty much explains you how to craft stuff that was not adapted to Lorecraft. This patch does that.

[color=yellow][b]How does it work?[/b][/color]
When the blacksmith asks you to craft a dagger (and later a hide helmet), you will get a book on how to do it. That simple.

[color=yellow][b]Installation[/b][/color]
Just load it after [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9959]Lorecraft - Vanilla.esp[/url] and you will be fine.

[b][color=yellow]My other mods that might interest you:[/color][/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27780]Diseased[/url]: a complete, rewarding, lore friendly disease system. Featured on G.E.M.S.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28329]Travel Mod[/url]: makes a horse useful: you can only fast travel with a mount.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28264]Weighted Arrows[/url]: makes arrows weigh.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28114]Potions Cooldown[/url]: anti-stacking effect for potions.
author: Manaflow
